author: veithen
msg: Moved the SizeAwareDataSource interface to org.apache.axiom.ext.activation, which is the right place for this kind of Axiom specific extension to existing APIs. This also allows to break a cyclic dependency between packages.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1756] add settings to svn ignore, update .project for m2eclipse.  This is only for the eclipse feature and update sites, normally, we don't store .project files in svn.

author: daijy
msg: PIG-1403: Make Pig work with remote HDFS in secure mode
